channel.title: Little help with modifying my server?
channel.description:
Well I'm pretty well new to the website and the making of runescape private servers. So just please tolerate a bit of confusion. ^^
I've searched a little bit and I've found a few helpful posts, but I would really prefer a direct feed of legitimate info directed to the exact topic. o.o
So I'm using Mezzy-Scape source and client. o.o
How would I go about editing the experience rates, and what the npc's say Along with the message of the day on the 'Click Here To Play' login screen. Very sorry if I'm not being detailed. o.o
Also, how would I add/delete/place npc's?
If there is an available GUI program that would help me out with this. That would be great ^^
Also could someone link me to the command editor? <--I'll keep looking for this, but still posting it in here to get all the questions out that I would appreciate being answered.
Thanks, ~Rosie[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 01:42:56 pm[/size][hr]*Bump*

item.title: Little help with modifying my server?
item.dc:creator: @Rosiered Rosiered
item.description:

Well I’m pretty well new to the website and the making of runescape private servers.
So just please tolerate a bit of confusion. ^^
